statements: SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM VehicleLocation WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM VehicleLocation WHERE speed > 60.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM VehicleLocation WHERE speed < 30.0
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM VehicleLocation WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id), AVG(speed) FROM VehicleLocation WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude, speed FROM VehicleLocation WHERE latitude >= 40.0 AND longitude <= -75.0
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE speed > 30 AND (latitude BETWEEN 35.0 AND 45.0) AND (longitude BETWEEN -80.0 AND -70.0) ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT location_timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY location_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_movement WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND distance_travelled > 100;
SELECT movement_id, vehicle_id, movement_timestamp FROM vehicle_movement ORDER BY movement_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS location_count FROM vehicle_locations GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY location_count DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(distance_travelled) AS avg_distance FROM vehicle_movement GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING avg_distance > 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations vl JOIN vehicle_movement vm ON vl.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id WHERE vl.latitude < 35 AND vm.distance_travelled > 100;
SELECT vl.vehicle_id, vm.start_location, vm.end_location, vm.movement_timestamp FROM vehicle_locations vl, vehicle_movement vm WHERE vl.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id ORDER BY vm.movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM VehicleLocation WHERE location_latitude > 40.0;
SELECT * FROM VehicleStatus WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM VehicleStatus WHERE vehicle_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, optimize_start FROM RouteOptimization WHERE optimize_start > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT vehicle_id, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM VehicleLocation ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.location_latitude, v.location_longitude, s.status FROM VehicleLocation v JOIN VehicleStatus s ON v.vehicle_id = s.vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM VehicleLocation WHERE location_latitude > 10 AND location_longitude < 20
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation vl JOIN RouteOptimization ro ON vl.vehicle_id = ro.vehicle_id WHERE ro.optimize_start < NOW()
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(alert_id) FROM alerts GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT AVG(latitude), AVG(longitude) FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;

SELECT vehicle_name, location_name FROM vehicles INNER JOIN movements ON vehicles.vehicle_id = movements.vehicle_id INNER JOIN locations ON movements.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE movements.movement_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY movements.movement_timestamp DESC;

SELECT v.vehicle_name, l.location_name, m.movement_timestamp FROM vehicles AS v, locations AS l, movements AS m WHERE v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id AND l.location_id = m.location_id AND l.latitude > 40 ORDER BY l.latitude ASC, m.movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM locations GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(location_id) > 1 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM location;
SELECT vehicle_id, longitude, latitude FROM location WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT company_name, driver_name FROM vehicle ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM movement WHERE movement_type = 'Arrival' AND movement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT driver_name, license_number, contact_number FROM driver WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT location.latitude, location.longitude, vehicle.driver_name FROM location INNER JOIN vehicle ON location.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id WHERE location.latitude > 40;
SELECT company.company_name, COUNT(*) AS vehicle_count FROM company INNER JOIN vehicle ON company.company_name = vehicle.company_name GROUP BY company.company_name;
SELECT driver.driver_name, driver.contact_number, vehicle.registration_number FROM driver INNER JOIN vehicle ON driver.driver_name = vehicle.driver_name;
SELECT movement.movement_id, movement_type, movement_time, vehicle_type FROM movement INNER JOIN vehicle ON movement.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id ORDER BY movement_time DESC LIMIT 5;
